attributes.additional_details: We are the family of jade lomas Anderson who was mauled to death by a pack of out of control dogs at a friends house we are trying to get the government to re introduce dog licences so they can control and enforce dog legislation we know from research that this can play a big part in helping to reduce dog cruelty and attacks that leave family's like ours from losing loved ones and people being left with life changing injuries we and other campaigners have helped to re introduce the new laws that have been passed but we believe this to be a big part in legislation and are backed by the RSPCA.Local.MP councils and other organisations we believe the government should look again . We has a family would not wish any one to endure the pain we feel of losing a child or anyone to be truthful and therefore would be very grateful if you would sign our petition thank you
